sentences.en: A couple of inches of dry, powdery snow had fallen.
sentences.cn: 下了数英寸厚的粉状干雪。

sentences.en: Food production has already fallen behind the population growth.
sentences.cn: 粮食生产已经跟不上人口增长。

sentences.en: He gets caviare that has fallen off the back of a lorry.
sentences.cn: 他能弄到来路不明的鱼子酱。

sentences.en: His eyes were shut and he seemed to have fallen asleep.
sentences.cn: 他眼睛闭着，似乎睡着了。

sentences.en: His people had fallen further and further into a quagmire of confusion.
sentences.cn: 他的人民在混乱不安的泥潭里越陷越深。

sentences.en: Industrial orders had already fallen in the preceding months.
sentences.cn: 工业订单在前几个月就已减少。

sentences.en: Inside all was disorder: drawers fallen out, shoes and boots scattered.
sentences.cn: 屋内凌乱不堪：抽屉都掉落出来，鞋靴东一只西一只满地都是。

sentences.en: Lili had fallen asleep clutching a fat bunch of grapes.
sentences.cn: 莉莉手里抓着一大串葡萄睡着了。

sentences.en: Michelle had fallen asleep with her head against his shoulder.
sentences.cn: 米歇尔睡着了，头靠在他的肩上。

sentences.en: Most of the damage that's occurred was simply because of fallen trees.
sentences.cn: 目前大部分损坏都是因为倒下的树木造成的。

sentences.en: One or two listeners had fallen asleep while the President was speaking.
sentences.cn: 总统讲话时有一两名听众睡着了。

sentences.en: Sales have fallen by more than 75 percent in recent years.
sentences.cn: 近几年来销售额下降了75%以上。

sentences.en: The bus is said to have over-turned and fallen into a ravine.
sentences.cn: 据说巴士发生翻车，跌进了峡谷。

sentences.en: The road was blocked by a fallen tree.
sentences.cn: 马路被倒下的一棵树堵住了。

sentences.en: Unemployment is rising again and retail buying has fallen off.
sentences.cn: 失业率再次上升，零售品购买量下降。

sentences.en: Work began on establishing the cemeteries as permanent memorials to the fallen.
sentences.cn: 把公墓建成阵亡战士的永久性纪念碑的工作已经开始。

words.tran_cn: [林] 一季所伐的木材；折缝；兽皮
掉下；摔倒；下垂；变坏（fall的过去式）
堕落的；落下来的；陷落的

trans.tran_cn: 倒下的，（女子）已失身的，落下的，落在地上的
trans.tran_en: on the ground after falling down

trans.tran_cn: 降低( fall的过去分词 )，来临，成为，降落
